uk.co.pori.winebrewdb.sqlite

Class DBEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.pori.winebrewdb.sqlite.DBEngine

  • public class DBEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The DBEngine is used for all queries to the sqlite database.
    Author:
    Paul.Bellchambers

      • scaledImageIcon

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon scaledImageIcon(int panelwidth,
                                    int panelheight,
                                    java.lang.String location)
        Scales the imageIconBrewPicture image to fit the width/height of the panel.
        Parameters:
        panelwidth - New width of the panel.
        panelheight - New height of the panel.
        location - Will be "file" if the image is a file on disk and not yet stored in the database, anything else otherwise.
        Returns:
        Returns the scaled image as imageIconScaledBrewPicture

      • addBrewCost

        public static void addBrewCost(java.lang.String brewref,
               java.lang.String brewcostlineitem,
               java.lang.String brewcostcost,
               java.lang.String brewcostsupplier)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a new cost for the selected brew to the BrewCosts table in the database.
        Parameters:
        brewref - The brewref for the selected brew.
        brewcostlineitem - The user entered lineitem string for the selected brew.
        brewcostcost - The user entered cost for the selected brew.
        brewcostsupplier - The user entered supplier for the selected brew.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNextBrewCostRef

                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the next available brew cost ref for the selected brew, by selecting the current highest value for that brew and adding 1.
        Parameters:
        brewref - The brewref for the selected brew.
        Returns:
        Returns the next brewcostref.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateBrewCost

        public static void updateBrewCost(java.lang.String brewref,
                  java.lang.String brewcostlineitem,
                  java.lang.String brewcostcost,
                  java.lang.String brewcostsupplier,
                  java.lang.String brewcostref)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the selected brew cost with the data entered by the user.
        Parameters:
        brewref - The brewref for the selected brew.
        brewcostlineitem - The user entered line item string for the brew cost.
        brewcostcost - The user entered cost for the brew cost.
        brewcostsupplier - The user entered supplier for the brew cost.
        brewcostref - The brewcostref of the selected brew cost.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                           throws java.lang.Exception

      • setTotalBrewCost

        public static void setTotalBrewCost(java.lang.String brewref,
                    java.lang.String numberbottles)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the total brew cost in the database for the selected brew. It does this by totalling the sum of all costs for the selected brew in sql, and then setting that value against the brew in the Brews table.
        Parameters:
        brewref - The brewref of the selected brew.
        numberbottles - The number of bottles on the brew data tab for the selected brew.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getTotalBrewCost

        public static java.lang.String getTotalBrewCost(java.lang.String brewref)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the total brew cost for the selected brew. It does this by totalling the sum of all costs for the selected brew in sql.
        Parameters:
        brewref - The brewref of the selected brew.
        Returns:
        Returns the total brew cost of the selected brew.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
